title: Deviate
description: Everyday life for Cleo has always been hectic, but her parents' death opens the proverbial can of worms that is her past. She finds out they have been on the run her whole life from a corrupt government entity that has done something strange to her DNA. Now it's all up to Cleo, with some help from her friends, to find out what happened and take them down.
author: Sally Slayer
